availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Granville C. Alfred (Mercer County, KY, farmer)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Martha Ray Alfred in Mercer County on October 14, 1830. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Washington County in 1850. Farmer in Mercer County in 1850. Farmer in Mercer County in 1860. Owned thirteen enslaved persons in Washington County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Washington, p. 502.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington, District 1, p. 102.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. X
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records - Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #000191852, Mercer County Marriages, p. 1.
Find A Grave, “Dr Granville C Alfred (unknown-May 27, 1873),” Memorial #69894033, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/69894033 (accessed June 4, 2017).
